title: Dr. Sonderbar
provenance: Acquired directly from V.I.A. (Valorisation de L'Innovation dans L"Ambeulement), 10 Place Ste Opportune, Paris, France, in connection to the CHNDM exhibition, " L'Art de Vivre," 1989
description: Upcurved square, perforated sheet metal seat mounted in frame of five arc-shaped tubular metal elements, one forming horizontal seat support, another the arms/back, and three as legs.
name: Armchair
